sentences.en: Bamboo plywood was used for the cabinetry and natural linoleum was used for the flooring.
sentences.cn: 用竹子胶版做家具,天然漆布铺地板.

sentences.en: For and maintenance of sealed and unsealed wood, linoleum and cork floors.
sentences.cn: 适用于所有蜡封和未蜡封的木地板 、 软木及油毡地面的保养.

sentences.en: For use on vinyl, asphalt, rubber, linoleum, sealed wood , terrazzo, slate and ceramic surfaces.
sentences.cn: 适用于胶地板 、 沥青地台 、 橡胶板 、 仿油地毡 、 水晶地板 、 水磨石地台 、 石板瓦及磁砖.

sentences.en: I happened to notice that they were barefoot on this cold linoleum floor.
sentences.cn: 我碰巧注意到,在这么冷的油布地面上他们竟然光着脚.

sentences.en: I hear him shuffling from the rug onto the linoleum behind me.
sentences.cn: 我听到他在我身后从地毯上移动到漆布上时支支唔唔地说.

sentences.en: It can be use on PVC, Linoleum , polyurethane , viny - asbestos , marble, stoneware ad so on.
sentences.cn: 适用于各种材料的地板,如PVC 、 油毡 、 聚氨脂 、 石类(大理石等)等地板.

sentences.en: Linoleum is flexible, warm and unaffected by ordinary floor temperatures, and it does not readily Burn.
sentences.cn: 油地毡柔韧 、 保暖、不受普通地面温度的影响 、 也不容易起火.

sentences.en: Linoleum is made of canvas coated with linseed.
sentences.cn: 油毡是由涂有亚麻油的帆布做成的.

sentences.en: Reception's custom desk is clad linoleum and topped in Corian.
sentences.cn: 接待区内的定制桌由油地毡饰面,其顶面为可丽耐材料.

sentences.en: The acid ate through the linoleum.
The cabins had linoleum tile floors.
The washing machine had leaked on my brand - new linoleum.
sentences.cn: 崭新的地毯上到处是从洗衣机里漏出的水.
他们把油毡放错了地方。

sentences.en: Wooden and stone slab floors gave way to user - friendly tile and linoleum.
sentences.cn: 便于使用的瓷砖和油毯代替了木质和石质地面.

trans.tran_cn: 油地毯，油毡，漆布，油地毡
trans.tran_en: a floor covering made from strong shiny material
